# SingleStoreDataSourceBuilder.UseName method

Sets the name of the [`SingleStoreDataSource`](../SingleStoreDataSource.md) that will be created.

```csharp
public SingleStoreDataSourceBuilder UseName(string? name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | The data source name. |

## Return Value

This builder, so that method calls can be chained.
